com.cleo.lexicom.external

Class HttpResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cleo.lexicom.external.HttpResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HttpResponse
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An HTTP server response used by an IHttpResponseListener. Refer to IHttpResponseListener.put(String[],LexCommand,HttpRequest,HttpResponse).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Returns the value of the specified response header.

      Returns the status code for the associated request.

      Returns the value of the specified response trailer.
      java.util.Enumeration getTrailerNames()
      Returns an enumeration of all the trailer names this response contains.
      java.lang.String getVersion()
      Returns the HTTP version used for this response

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        public java.lang.String getVersion()
        Returns the HTTP version used for this response
        Returns:
        a String containing the HTTP version for this response (can be null)

      • getStatusCode

        public int getStatusCode()
        Returns the status code for the associated request. These are grouped as follows:
        • 1xx - Informational (new in HTTP/1.1)
        • 2xx - Success
        • 3xx - Redirection
        • 4xx - Client Error
        • 5xx - Server Error
        Returns:
        an int value containing the status code for the associated request

      • getReasonLine

        public java.lang.String getReasonLine()
        Returns the reason line associated with the status code.
        Returns:
        a String containing the reason line associated with the status code

      • getHeaderNames

        public java.util.Enumeration getHeaderNames()
        Returns an enumeration of all the header names this response contains. If the response has no headers, this method returns an empty enumeration.
        Returns:
        an enumeration of all the header names sent with this response; if the response has no headers, an empty enumeration

      • getHeader

        public java.lang.String getHeader(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the value of the specified response header.
        Parameters:
        name - a (case-insensitive) String specifying the header name
        Returns:
        a String containing the value of the requested header, or null if the response does not have any headers of that name

      • getTrailerNames

        public java.util.Enumeration getTrailerNames()
        Returns an enumeration of all the trailer names this response contains. If the response has no trailers, this method returns an empty enumeration.
        Returns:
        an enumeration of all the trailer names sent with this response; if the response has no trailers, an empty enumeration

      • getTrailer

        public java.lang.String getTrailer(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the value of the specified response trailer.
        Parameters:
        name - a (case-insensitive) String specifying the trailer name
        Returns:
        a String containing the value of the requested trailer, or null if the response does not have any trailers of that name
